content.rendered:
Experience The Highest Quality Extensions by Lash Works Experts

At Ebenezer Eyelash, our team of committed lash technicians has been providing the highest quality lash extension treatments for more than a decade. We started on our beauty shop journey in 2002, and were early pioneers in the New York City area as we set out to raise the bar for professional eyelash extensions throughout the city. Since those early days, we have continued to break new ground as we relentlessly pursue the most innovative and effective eyelash designs to meet each customer’s unique needs.

Our Team

All of the members of our team were chosen for their unparalleled commitment to excellence and proven skills. Each of our talented lash technicians is more than just an eyelash specialist – they’re all specialists who pride themselves on customer care and creativity. We know that your unique look matters to you, and we strive to identify the perfect last and design to showcase your inner and outer beauty. At Ebenezer Eyelash, you’ll get the eyelash extensions you need in the warm and relaxed environment you deserve.

Our Products

Our application techniques utilize only the best lash extensions, applied with care to ensure that you look and feel your best after every treatment. Our products are safe and durable, and every application is performed with your comfort and satisfaction in mind. We offer pre-curved lashes in a variety of sizes and thicknesses so that you can always find just the right lash for the look you want.

Our Salons

Each of our two salon locations are designed to ensure that your experience is warm and inviting. Our friendly staff is there to help guide you through the extension process in an environment that will have you feeling right at home. In fact, don’t be surprised if you gently drift off to sleep in our chairs as you enjoy the comforting ambiance – you certainly wouldn’t be the first customer to do so!

Our Mission

Our objective has always been simple: to provide our guests with the most relaxing experience possible, service that is truly exceptional, and application techniques that are second to none. To accomplish that goal, our technicians bring unique passion to their craft as they work to provide expert advice, professional courtesy, and technical excellence to each extension session.

We truly believe that each of our guests is beautiful both inside and out, and we’re dedicated to helping each of them rediscover that beauty. As a result of that belief, our mission is to create and maintain a salon atmosphere in which inner and outer beauty, wellness, diversity, laughter, and joy are all celebrated each and every day.

Your Feedback

We pride ourselves on being flexible and adaptive to our guests’ needs. To accomplish that goal, though, we need to hear from you! Be sure to communicate with us both during and after your appointment so that we can ensure that your every experience with Ebenezer Eyelash always exceeds your expectations. Contact us today for the best eyelash extensions in New York City!
